json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="bgpConnections">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="ipConfigurations">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="routeMaps">
<prop type="array" name="routes">
<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="virtualHubRouteTableV2s">
<prop type="array" name="attachedConnections">
<prop type="array" name="routes">
<prop type="array" name="destinations">
<prop type="array" name="nextHops">
<prop type="array" name="virtualRouterIps">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.routeTable.routes" options="routes">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.routeTable.routes[].addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s" options="virtual-hub-route-table-v2s" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.attachedConnections" options="attached-connections" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.routes" options="routes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.routes[].destinations" options="destinations">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.routes[].nextHops" options="next-hops">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualRouterIps" options="virtual-router-ips" hide="True" group="Properties">

argGroup.name: VirtualHubParameters
argGroup.arg: <help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>

help.short: Name or ID of the virtual WAN.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="routes" arg="$virtualHubParameters.properties.routeTable.routes">
<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes" arg="$virtualHubParameters.properties.routeTable.routes[].addressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="virtualHubRouteTableV2s" arg="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s">
<prop type="array" name="attachedConnections" arg="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.attachedConnections">
<prop type="array" name="routes" arg="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.routes">
<prop type="array" name="destinations" arg="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.routes[].destinations">
<prop type="array" name="nextHops" arg="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.routes[].nextHops">
<prop type="array" name="virtualRouterIps" arg="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualRouterIps">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.routeTable.routes" options="routes">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.routeTable.routes[].addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s" options="virtual-hub-route-table-v2s" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.attachedConnections" options="attached-connections" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.routes" options="routes" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualHubRouteTableV2s[].properties.routes[].destinations" options="destinations">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$virtualHubParameters.properties.virtualRouterIps" options="virtual-router-ips" hide="True" group="Properties">
